posts.post_content:
Hey all, I'm selling a chunk of my collection to get more focused.

Piedmont 350, Factory 25. As with all of my cards, colors and registration are particularly strong. Colors in this case are supremely strong!

PM, or first to post "I'll take it" gets priority.

SOLD. Paypal F&F preferred. Please look out for some other cards of mine as well! Thanks
